creator: Fibermode Limited
descriptionHtml:
Bitcoin is one of the world’s most sought-after assets ever, and with Mode, making it grow has never been easier.

Mode is an all-in-one next-gen app for Bitcoin designed for both newbies and experts of crypto to easily hold and earn interest on their Bitcoin holdings.

Through our Bitcoin Jar feature, users can put Bitcoin to work by generating interest, unlocking the full potential of their digital assets rather than simply holding them dormant.

Here are all the things you can do with Mode:

Open an account in under 60 seconds:

- Download the app and sign up for free
- Access your Bitcoin anytime and anywhere
- Complete a simple ID verification

Store and send Bitcoin with confidence:

- Assets are held with one of the world’s most secure crypto custodians
- Add or send Bitcoin seamlessly using QR codes
- Send Bitcoin instantly and for free (no network fees) to other Mode users, anytime, anywhere

Earn interest on your Bitcoin:

- Receive compound interest in Bitcoin
- Accrue interest daily and get credited weekly (every Friday)
- Withdraw anytime without any penalty

With Mode, Bitcoin is as simple as black & white


Risk disclaimer:

When you deposit your Bitcoin assets into the Bitcoin Jar with Mode, your assets are lent out to vetted borrowers and therefore are not held with our Bitcoin custodian. Please also note that your assets won’t be subject to the protection of the FSCS nor the FOS. As with any asset, the value of Bitcoin can go up or down (and can even drop to zero), may be very volatile and there can be a substantial risk that you lose money.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Welcome to Mode BETA.
We’re very excited to have added Sterling functionality to our app, which means you can now top up your account with GBP funds and start buying and selling Bitcoin instantly (check out our Open Banking feature - it makes topping up incredibly fast and convenient). So what are you waiting for? Download Mode today and start investing in the future, today.

descriptionShort: Welcome to Mode, your next-gen app for Bitcoin!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Refer a friend and for a limited time you can both get £20 worth of Bitcoin (T&Cs apply).
Biometric security added to keep your account safer than ever.

Bug fixes.

title: Mode: Buy, Hold & Grow Bitcoin

creator: Fibermode Limited
descriptionHtml:
Bitcoin is one of the world’s most sought-after assets ever, and with Mode, buying, storing and growing it has never been easier.

Mode is the all-in-one app for your money and Bitcoin designed so that both newbies and experts of crypto can easily buy, store and earn interest on Bitcoin, and access it anytime, anywhere.

We hate complex fee structures where users get charged here, there and everywhere. That’s why we designed our pricing to be transparent and affordable. We only charge a very competitive fee of 0.99% at the time of purchasing and selling Bitcoin — nothing else. We won’t charge you for transferring GBP in and out of your account either.

But that's not the best part - through our Bitcoin Jar, you can generate interest on your Bitcoin, unlocking the full potential of your digital assets rather than simply holding them dormant.

Here are all the things you can do with Mode:

Open an account in under 60 seconds:

- Download the app and sign up for free
- Access your Bitcoin anytime and anywhere
- Complete a simple ID verification and add GBP via 'Faster Payments' to your account for free

Buy Bitcoin easily:

- Buy Bitcoin using your GBP balance or debit/credit card
- Know the exact amount of Bitcoin you will get before paying
- Only pay a 0.99% fee when buying and selling Bitcoin

Store and send Bitcoin with confidence:

- Assets are held with one of the world’s most secure crypto custodians
- Add or send Bitcoin seamlessly
- Send Bitcoin instantly and for free (no network fees) to other Mode users, anytime, anywhere

Earn interest on your Bitcoin:

- Receive compound interest in Bitcoin
- Accrue interest daily and get credited weekly (every Friday)
- Withdraw anytime without any penalty

With Mode, Bitcoin is as simple as black & white.

title: Mode: Buy, Hold & Grow Bitcoin

creator: Fibermode Limited
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Mode, the UK’s first app that lets you shop, earn and grow your Bitcoin, all in one place.

Whether you’re a Bitcoin beginner, or an experienced Bitcoin investor - we’ve got you covered. The Mode app allows you to pay securely using just your phone, and supercharge your shopping experience by getting rewarded with Bitcoin Cashback. As a listed, licenced and FCA registered company, you can buy, store and manage your Bitcoin with trust, as well as track the performance of your Bitcoin through our real time graph and push notifications.

With our new payments feature, you can leave your wallet behind, and buy the things you love using just your phone. No billing addresses, card details, or CVV’s - simply scan a QR code or click a button to check out in seconds at our partner brands! The best part? You’ll receive your Bitcoin Cashback immediately after purchase - it couldn’t be easier!

Here are all the things you can do with Mode:

NEW - Earn Bitcoin Cashback:

- Supercharge your shopping with Bitcoin Cashback
- Earn up to 25% Bitcoin Cashback when you pay with Mode, at our partner brands!
- Checkout in seconds and accumulate the best-performing  asset of the decade* risk-free!
- Receive your Bitcoin Cashback immediately after your purchase

NEW - Make seamless payments

- No billing addresses, card details or CVV’s - just hassle free mobile payments
- Use your Mode balance, or UK bank account to pay at our partner brands
- Pay seamlessly by scanning a QR code or clicking a button - Securely verify payments with your biometric ID

Open an account in under 60 seconds:

- Download the Mode app and sign up for free
- Access your Bitcoin anytime and anywhere
- Complete a simple ID verification and top up GBP via 'Open Banking'

Track your Bitcoin performance

- Easily monitor price movements with our real time graph and push notifications- Check your total portfolio value, and its overall performance over time
- Easily keep track of how much you’ve invested

Buy, store and manage your Bitcoin, with trust:

- Add or withdraw funds in just a few clicks, using your UK bank account.
- Purchase Bitcoin anytime or anywhere, with our low and transparent fees.
- Store your Bitcoin with a leading crypto custodian
- Only pay a 0.99% fee when buying and selling Bitcoin

Get your Mode friends involved

- Skip the network fees and long waits!
- Send Bitcoin freely and instantly to your Mode contacts with our peer to peer transfer feature.

With Mode, Bitcoin really is as simple as black & white. Whether you’re a Bitcoin beginner or an experienced Bitcoin investor, we’re here to guide you through your Bitcoin Journey. Start your Bitcoin journey, the Mode way.

The Mode app is available to UK residents only.

Risk disclaimer:
Please also note that your assets won’t be subject to the protection of the FSCS nor the FOS. As with any asset, the value of Bitcoin can go up or down (and can even drop to zero), may be very volatile and there can be a substantial risk that you lose money.
